titleStmt.title: Christian consolations taught from five heads in religion I. Faith. II. Hope. III. The Holy Spirit. IV. Prayer. V. The Sacraments. Written by a learned prelate.
titleStmt.author: Learned prelate.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Royston, bookseller to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: "I. Faith" to "IV. Prayer" are connected by a complex system of brackets.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
